meanings.definition: A day or period of celebration or feasting.
meanings.sent1: The town had a big festival to celebrate the harvest.
meanings.sent2: I love going to the annual summer festival in the park.
meanings.sent3: The festival was so fun that even the grumpy old man couldn't resist dancing.
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the festival like a bright lantern in the night.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of delicious food filled the festival grounds, tempting everyone to indulge.

meanings.definition: An organized series of events such as musical performances or films.
meanings.sent1: The music festival featured bands from all over the country.
meanings.sent2: We bought tickets for the film festival happening next weekend.
meanings.sent3: The festival of movies turned the sleepy town into a bustling hub of excitement.
meanings.sent4: The festival of lights illuminated the city with a magical glow.
meanings.sent5: The festival of music echoed through the valley, enchanting all who listened.
